name: AI Loan Generator
description:
An AI-powered tool designed to generate test loans in a Loan Origination System (LOS) using Natural Language Processing (NLP) and Machine Learning. The system allows users to create realistic loan scenarios through natural language inputs, automating the loan generation process for testing environments.

Technologies Used:

  • Python
  • OpenAI API (GPT-based NLP)
  • FastAPI
  • PostgreSQL
  • AWS (Lambda, DynamoDB, S3)
  • Hugging Face Transformers

name: Content Generation Model
description: An AI-powered content generation tool using GPT-like architecture.
